korean: 오늘 중요한 고객사와 미팅이 있어서 아침부터 긴장했다.
어제 밤에 발표 자료 마지막으로 점검하느라 늦게 잤어.
발표 자료 준비도 완벽하게 하고 예상 질문도 다 정리했다.
팀원들이랑 사전 리허설도 했는데 그래도 떨리더라.
미팅은 생각보다 잘 진행됐고 고객도 만족스러워하는 것 같았다.
중간에 질문 몇 개 나왔는데 다행히 다 대답할 수 있었어.
미팅 끝나고 고객이 긍정적으로 검토하겠다고 하셨어.
계약이 성사되면 좋겠다. 일단 최선을 다했으니 결과를 기다려봐야지.
이번 주 안에 좋은 소식 오면 정말 좋을 텐데.
english: I had an important client meeting today and I was nervous from the morning.
Last night I stayed up late doing a final check on the presentation materials.
I prepared the presentation materials perfectly and organized all the expected questions.
We did a rehearsal with the team beforehand, but I was still nervous.
The meeting went better than expected and the client seemed satisfied.
There were a few questions in the middle, but luckily I could answer them all.
Our team leader gave good supplementary explanations, which made it easier.
After the meeting, the client said they'd review it positively.
I hope we land the contract. I did my best, so now I'll just wait for the results.
I bought coffee for my teammates and told them they worked hard.
We all encouraged each other saying we did well.
It'd be really great if we get good news this week.
